# Data description

In this study, the Eckle and Grossman risk elicitation task was implemented before and after the participants experience 24 realizations of the tasks. These correspond with **Gamble.1** and **Gamble.2** variables. 
This dataset contains the result from 6 experimental sessions. 

```{r}
load('../data/ExperienceRisk_Sessions.RData')
head(ExperienceRisk_Sessions)
```
